title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly.
5. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
